title: Impossible Conversations, Peter Boghossian, Helen Pluckrose, James Lindsay & Letter.Wiki
description:
How can we begin to resolve our problems, if even our conversations about them keep breaking down? Peter Boghossian and James Lindsay have researched ninja-level conversation techniques from hostage negotiation and cult deprogramming for their new book, 'How To Have Impossible Conversations'. At the same time, a new competition has been launched on 'Letter.Wiki' to have difficult conversations across intellectual divides.

We talk to the book's authors, Peter Boghossian and James Lindsay, the judge of the 'Impossible Conversations' competition, Helen Pluckrose, and the creators of the social media site Letter.Wiki, Clyde and Dayne Rathbone.

'How To Have Impossible Conversations': https://www.hachettebookgroup.com/titles/peter-boghossian/how-to-have-impossible-conversations/9780738285320/

Letter.Wiki: https://letter.wiki/conversations

Check out Rebel Wisdom's series of films 'The Science and Psychology of Difficult Conversation': https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EUNHj5eh7BM

To get access to more exclusive content, become a Rebel Wisdom subscriber: https://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans

We've also just launched the Rebel Wisdom store! Buy T Shirts and more on https://shop.rebelwisdom.co.uk

You can listen to a podcast versions of our films on Spotify or Apple Podcasts by searching 'Rebel Wisdom' or download episodes from our Podbean page: https://rebelwisdom.podbean.com/ 

We also have a Rebel Wisdom Discord discussion channel: https://discord.gg/RK4MeYW
